item.title: One Last Song Interview
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
Now, you may wonder where I am going with this, especially since this is a NiNe QuestioNs installment and not my ordinary run of the mill article. Well, I have an answer for you and answer is what I hope becomes everyone's new favorite comic book. I'm already itching to sink my teeth into this series, and I haven't collected comics in a few years.
The fine folks over at The Horror Library interviewed Shawn and CJ about One Last Song, head over to their blog to check it out.
